heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
registerSubtext: Enter your information to create an account.
registerSuccessDescription: Please check your email to verify your account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
editGuideDescription: Make changes to the guide's information here.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details here.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
whatsappCommunityTitle: Join our WhatsApp community to stay informed about our events.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced and compassionate guides who will accompany you on your healing journey.
contactCommunityText: Join our community to connect with other seekers and stay up-to-date with our latest news and events. We're here to support you on your path.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). Traditionally used by indigenous communities for healing and spiritual purposes, this medicine is known for its ability to induce profound states of introspection and altered consciousness.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The combination of plants in Ayahuasca creates a powerful synergy. The Chacruna leaves contain DMT, a potent psychoactive compound, while the Ayahuasca vine contains harmala alkaloids that act as MAO inhibitors. This allows the DMT to be orally active, facilitating deep visions and emotional release.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches and guides. Through visions and introspection, it helps individuals confront and heal deep-seated emotional wounds, gain clarity on their life's purpose, and connect with a higher sense of consciousness. It is a tool for profound self-discovery and transformation.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many people report a significant reduction in mental 'noise', gaining a clearer perspective on their lives, problems, and purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can help release repressed emotions and traumas, leading to profound emotional and psychological healing.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionTitle: Connection with the Self and the Universe
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Participants often experience a powerful sense of connection with themselves, others, nature, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Shared in a safe and respectful space, the group energy can amplify the healing experience, creating a sense of community and mutual support.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies with one-on-one guidance from our experienced facilitators.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and transformative power of the sacred Ayahuasca brew.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced team that will accompany you with respect and professionalism on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find all the necessary information to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for a deep and meaningful experience.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Your journey of transformation begins long before the ceremony. Proper preparation is essential to open your body, mind, and spirit to the teachings of the medicine. Follow this guide to get the most out of your experience.
preparationProcessDescription: The journey with Ayahuasca is a process that encompasses preparation, the ceremony itself, and subsequent integration. Each stage is crucial for a profound and lasting transformation.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where, under the guidance of facilitators, you will connect with the medicine to explore your inner world.
experienceProcessDescription: A unique and personal journey of introspection, visions, and emotional release that reveals deep aspects of your being.
integrationProcessDescription: The process of incorporating the lessons and revelations from the ceremony into your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet purifies your body, increasing its sensitivity to the medicine. It is recommended to start at least 3-7 days before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables. Grains like rice, quinoa, and oats. Legumes. White meats (chicken, fish). Water and natural infusions.
prohibitedFoodsList: Red and processed meats. Fermented foods (aged cheeses, soy). Very spicy, fried, or sugary foods. Alcohol, caffeine, and recreational drugs.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Calm your mind and open your heart to receive the teachings of the medicine.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to quiet the mind and increase your presence.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. A clear intention is a powerful guide.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony. It is a good way to clarify your intentions.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring to the surface deep and sometimes difficult emotions. It is a process of purification. Trust the medicine and our guides; we are here to support you in a safe and caring environment. The key is to surrender, trust, and allow the medicine to show you what you need to see.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, loose, light-colored clothing (preferably white). Blanket and pillow or mat. A change of clothes.
essentialsList: A bottle of water. A notebook and pen to jot down your reflections. An open heart and a willingness to surrender to the experience.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: To access the preparation guide and start your journey, you need an account. Sign in or register to continue.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: To view all our ceremonies and reserve your spot, you need an account. Sign in or register to continue.
authRequiredCoursesDescription: To access your personalized preparation courses, you need an account. Sign in or register to continue.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDesc: Such as heart problems, high blood pressure, diabetes, etc.

questionnaireMedicationDesc: Including antidepressants, antibiotics, or any other regular treatment.
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please specify the medications you are taking.

questionnaireMentalHealthDesc: Such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis, etc.

questionnaireExperienceDesc: Your previous experience helps us better understand your journey.

myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: This is a summary of the answers you provided in the medical questionnaire.

importWarningDescription: Importing a file will overwrite all current data in the database. This action is irreversible. A backup of the current state will be created automatically before importing.
importSuccessDescription: The page will now reload to reflect the changes.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before your last import. You can restore the data to its state before the import.
rollbackWarningTitle: Are you sure you want to restore?
rollbackWarningDescription: This will overwrite the data from your last import with the data from the automatic backup.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been rolled back to the previous state.

aiGuideDescription: To deepen your preparation, we invite you to explore two key tools.
aiGuideContent: Our AI Spiritual Guide can answer your questions, while the courses will provide you with the necessary foundation for the ceremony.
